data.eml:eml: Two new species of Itagonia Reitter (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Blaptini) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Ai-min (2013): Two new species of Itagonia Reitter (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Blaptini) from China. ZooKeys 309: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.309.5499, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.309.5499
